faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Should UAE-based businesses invest in a virtual receptionist?
items.answer: A virtual assistant can help your business reduce overheads, improve customer satisfaction, generate qualified leads, and boost revenue by answering calls in real-time.

items.question: Can I customise how the receptionist answers calls?
items.answer: Yes, our experts provide tailored greetings and scripts that reflect your brand's voice, tone, and values.

items.question: How quickly does One Nexuz onboard?
items.answer: You can go live within 24 to 48 hours once we receive your business details and preferences.

items.question: Do I need to own a physical office or a business license to use this service?
items.answer: No. We offer virtual receptionist services for startups, SMEs, and those without a physical office.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer real receptionists or an automated system?
items.answer: All calls are answered by real, trained professionals who understand your unique business.
